reviews.text:
*** DOG FRIENDLY *** üê∂üê∂üê∂

Went there 2 evenings in a row.
- Staff are very friendly and quick.
- Menu is great, with many different options from traditional dishes to modern dishes
- A few big screens to watch sports, primarily football
- Food was served very quickly
- Had Pizza and Pasta, both amazing and filling!
- Prices are decent

Don't miss out, a great place if you want to leave with a big smile on your face!
Nice vibes. Food at good price! Nice atmosphere. Spacious for family with kids and pet friendly. Vegetarian friendly. God service.efficient. popular among Italians. At night they have DJ!

We sat down for almost 10 minutes without any service or greeting, even though we made eye contact with several waiters. Only then were we told that the menu is available online by scanning the QR code. We ordered a mega mix of fried food as an appetizer, and it was disappointing‚Äî‚Ç¨10 for mostly fries. We checked Google reviews and the photos taken by previous customers, and what we received was not the same.

We ordered gnocchi and pasta. The taste was good until I realized my pasta was microwaved. Some pasta was still cold and stuck together from not heating up properly.

The location is amazing, but I wish I had ordered a pizza so they couldn‚Äôt cheat with microwaved food.

We came for lunch on a very windy day in late March.  Inside their attached structure with roll down walls, you would hardly know it was stormy outside.  Super friendly server who spoke enough English to street is to the right choices including local wine.  We each enjoyed a salad - portion size is huge; we should have shared a salad!  Very fresh ingredients and very tasty.

A pizza good enough,  but I had better.
Nice staff, order ready very quickly.
